description: Try our easy to follow Crumbed Fish With Homemade Tartare Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Crumbed Fish With Homemade Tartare Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the tartare sauce, process egg yolks and lemon juice in a small food processor until combined. With the motor running, slowly add olive oil in a thin, steady stream until thick and creamy. Transfer to a bowl. Add capers, gherkin and parsley, and season with salt. Cover with plastic and refrigerate until needed.
Preheat oven to 200°C. Line two baking trays with baking paper. Place flour in a bowl and season with salt and pepper. Whisk eggs in a separate bowl. Place breadcrumbs in a third bowl.

Cut the fish into thick fingers. Dust with flour, dip lightly into egg and thinly coat with breadcrumbs. Lay onto trays. Drizzle or spray well with oil. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Serve with lemon wedges and tartare sauce.
